sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Play, Pause, SkipBack, SkipForward, Heart, Clock, Music, TrendingUp, Calendar, Search, Database, Disc } from 'lucide-react'; import StatCard from '../components/StatCard'; // Mock data for now - will connect to real Spotify API const mockNowPlaying = { isPlaying: false, track: null }; const mockRecentTracks = [ { id: 1, name: "Bohemian Rhapsody", artist: "Queen", album: "A Night at the Opera", playedAt: "2 hours ago", duration: "5:55" }, { id: 2, name: "Hotel California", artist: "Eagles", album: "Hotel California", playedAt: "3 hours ago", duration: "6:30" }, { id: 3, name: "Stairway to Heaven", artist: "Led Zeppelin", album: "Led Zeppelin IV", playedAt: "5 hours ago", duration: "8:02" }, { id: 4, name: "Sweet Child O' Mine", artist: "Guns N' Roses", album: "Appetite for Destruction", playedAt: "Yesterday", duration: "5:03" }, ]; const mockStats = { totalTracks: 1247, listeningTime: "42h 15m", topArtist: "Queen", uniqueArtists: 89 }; const mockTopArtists = [ { name: "Queen", plays: 47, color: "from-red-500 to-orange-500" }, { name: "Pink Floyd", plays: 38, color: "from-blue-500 to-purple-500" }, { name: "Led Zeppelin", plays: 32, color: "from-green-500 to-teal-500" }, { name: "Eagles", plays: 28, color: "from-yellow-500 to-orange-500" }, { name: "The Beatles", plays: 25, color: "from-purple-500 to-pink-500" }, ]; export default function Spotify() { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('recent'); const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(''); const tabs = [ { id: 'recent', label: 'Recent', icon: Clock }, { id: 'database', label: 'Database', icon: Database }, { id: 'stats', label: 'Stats', icon: TrendingUp }, { id: 'discover', label: 'Discover', icon: Disc }, ]; return (
{/* Header */}

Spotify Command Center

Your music intelligence and listening analytics.

{/* Left Panel - Now Playing */}

Now Playing

{mockNowPlaying.isPlaying ? (

{mockNowPlaying.track?.name}

{mockNowPlaying.track?.artist}

{mockNowPlaying.track?.album}

{/* Progress Bar */}
1:23 3:45
{/* Controls */}
) : (

Nothing playing right now

Start playing music on Spotify to see it here

)}
{/* Right Panel - Tabs Content */}
{/* Stats Cards */}
{/* Tabs */}
{tabs.map((tab) => { const Icon = tab.icon; return ( ); })}
{/* Recent Tab */} {activeTab === 'recent' && (

Recently Played

{mockRecentTracks.map((track) => (

{track.name}

{track.artist} â€¢ {track.album}

{track.duration}

{track.playedAt}

))}
)} {/* Database Tab */} {activeTab === 'database' && (
setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} className="w-full bg-raven-bg border border-raven-border rounded-lg pl-10 pr-4 py-2 text-sm text-raven-text placeholder-raven-muted focus:outline-none focus:border-raven-orange transition-colors" />

Database view coming soon

Connect Spotify API to see your full library

)} {/* Stats Tab */} {activeTab === 'stats' && (

Top Artists

{mockTopArtists.map((artist, index) => (
#{index + 1}
{artist.name} {artist.plays} plays
))}
Listening by Day
{['Mon', 'Tue', 'Wed', 'Thu', 'Fri', 'Sat', 'Sun'].map((day, i) => (
{day}
))}
Listening by Hour
{Array.from({ length: 24 }).map((_, i) => (
))}
12AM 12PM 11PM
)} {/* Discover Tab */} {activeTab === 'discover' && (

Discover new music based on your taste

Recommendations coming soon

)}
); }
